title: Permaban pls
body: hey riot can you please permaban my account ive lost interest in this game and really dont give a shit anymore whether i play it or not

replies.body: Ehhhh we don't really like issuing punishments for no reason at all, but you can always write in a ticket to have us either disable or entirely delete the account if you'd prefer. Think carefully about it though!
give me the account. I will happily take it, reply and u can send me the info if u want. I need accounts cuz playing one account gets boring
